messages.content:
VERIFICATION COMPLETE ✅

  Counters Endpoint Status:
  - ✅ WORKING - Endpoint responds correctly
  - ✅ TRACKING - Counts rising (64 → 257 in 10 seconds)
  - ✅ ACCURATE - 60s window and total counts both functional

  Event Status:
  - ✅ tick_frame_v1: 257 events (~19/sec) - Dashboard timeline
   data flowing
  - ✅ wm.emit: 257 events (~19/sec) - WM halo data flowing
  - ❌ node.flip: MISSING - Felix's PR-C not emitting
  - ❌ link.flow.summary: MISSING - Felix's PR-C not emitting

  Root Cause Analysis (node.flip/link.flow.summary missing):

  From Victor's earlier diagnosis: "All engines show Active:
  0/XXX - NO nodes above threshold!"

  This means:
  - All nodes have E < theta (energy below threshold)
  - No nodes are "flipping" (crossing threshold)
  - No stride execution happening (no link flows)
  - Felix's PR-C events are correctly coded but conditionally
  silent when no activity

  Next Step: Inject high-severity stimulus to create active
  nodes and trigger PR-C events:
